variables.input:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| dedup callType
| fields callType

fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| dedup trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName
| fields trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName
| filterOut isNull(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName)

fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| dedup callerNumber
| fields callerNumber
| sort callerNumber asc

fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| dedup calleeNumber
| fields calleeNumber
| sort calleeNumber asc

0.title: Daily Active Users per Azure Region
0.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| makeTimeseries `Daily Active Users` = countDistinct(userPrincipalName), by: { mediaPathLocation, signalingLocation }, interval:1d
| filterOut isNull(mediaPathLocation) OR isNull(signalingLocation)

1.title: Details (Last 50 calls)
1.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| fields timestamp, duration, userDisplayName, callType, callerNumber, calleeNumber, Success = successfulCall, Cause = finalSipCodePhrase
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 50

2.title: Total Calls
2.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| summarize countDistinct(call.id)

3.title: Total Minutes
3.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| summarize sum(duration)

4.content:
**Teams user call types**
* dr_in - the user received an inbound PSTN call
* dr_out - the user placed an outbound PSTN call
* dr_out_user_conf - the user added a PSTN participant to the call
* dr_out_user_forwarding - the user forwarded the call to a PSTN number
* dr_out_user_transfer - the user transferred the call to a PSTN number
* dr_emergency_out - the user made an emergency call
* dr_unassigned_in - an inbound PSTN call via Direct Routing to an unassigned number
* ByotIn - inbound PSTN call towards Direct Routing licensed user
* ByotOut - Outbound call made from DIrect Routing licensed user
* ByotOutUserConf - User escalating 1:1 call to meeting adding a PSTN participant and not having a CPC license
* ByotOutUserForwarding - PSTN outbound call from forwarded user to tenant's Carrier
* ByotOutUserTransfer - PSTN outbound call from transferred user to tenant's Carrier
* ByotOutEmergency - PSTN outbound call from Direct Routing licensed user

**Teams bots call types**
* dr_in_bot - an inbound PSTN call to a Teams bot such as auto attendant or call queue
* dr_out_bot - an outbound PSTN call from a Teams bot such as auto attendant or call queue

5.title: Count by CallType
5.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| filterOut isNull(callType)
| makeTimeseries count(), by:{ callType }, interval:1d

6.title: Count by SIP Code
6.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| makeTimeseries count(), by: {finalSipCodePhrase }, interval:1d

7.title: Successful calls
7.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter matchesValue(log.source,"MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting")
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| makeTimeseries count(), by: { successfulCall }, interval:1d

10.title: Network Effectiveness Ratio
10.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket=="ms_teams"
| filter log.source == "MSTeams_CallRecords_DirectRouting"
| filter in(callType, array($DirectRoutingCallType))
AND in(trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName, array($SBC))
AND in(callerNumber, array($callerNumber))
AND in(calleeNumber, array($calleeNumber))
| summarize NER = (100 * 
(countIf(finalSipCode == 0) // OK
+ countIf(finalSipCode == 486) // Busy
+ countIf(finalSipCode == 483)) // Too many hops
/ count()),
by:{ trunkFullyQualifiedDomainName }
